update-cursor-models.template: Run `cursor-agent --model invalid` to get the list of all available Cursor models. Compare this list with the models defined in the cursor-acp provider section of dot_config/opencode/opencode.json. Add any missing models to the config file with appropriate configuration (tool_call: true, temperature: true, attachment: true, and reasonable context/output limits based on similar models). Apply the changes using chezmoi.

commit-staged.template: Analyze staged changes and create a commit following conventional commit format (type(scope): description). Common types: feat, fix, refactor, docs, style, test, chore. Keep subject under 50 chars. Create the commit and output only the final commit message.
commit-staged.description: Generate commit message for staged changes
